meanings.definition: A student in a college or university who has not yet earned a bachelor's degree.
meanings.sent1: The undergrad was excited to start their first semester at the university.
meanings.sent2: Many undergrads attend lectures and participate in campus activities.
meanings.sent3: The undergrad accidentally walked into the professor's office thinking it was a classroom.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an undergrad exploring the vast world of knowledge for the first time.
meanings.sent5: Becoming an undergrad opens the door to endless learning opportunities.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to undergraduate students.
meanings.sent1: The undergrad club organized a fun event for all students.
meanings.sent2: The undergrad curriculum includes various introductory courses.
meanings.sent3: It was an undergrad prank to switch all the classroom chairs around.
meanings.sent4: The undergrad spirit filled the campus during orientation week.
meanings.sent5: Her undergrad enthusiasm for learning was contagious among her peers.
